page.title: 08Small businesses -specific
page.content: Businesses in this area include a motor repairer between Biggin and Little Fenton who also does on the spot M.O.T.tests, and a garage in Church Fenton which provides all motor services including dieselfuel and paraffin which has been supplied since the garage's establishment in 1947. Both attract trade from Leeds and Selby as well as locally.There is a chicken farmer who supplies fresh bought-in poultry to small butchers within a 13miles radius and delivers locally to individuals.A builder works principally for the County and District Councils and a Tadcaster brewery mostly repairs and maintenance and some local work.A hairdresser working from home and a wool shop provide a local service to suit the needs of their customers.
